scripts.clean: npm exec --workspaces -- npx rimraf node_modules && npx rimraf target && npx rimraf node_modules && cargo clean
scripts.lint:client: cd quadratic-client && npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:eslint && lint:prettier && lint:clippy
scripts.build:wasm:types: cd quadratic-core && CC=clang AR=llvm-ar cargo run --bin export_types --features js
scripts.watch:wasm:javascript: cd quadratic-core && cargo watch -s 'CC=clang AR=llvm-ar wasm-pack build --dev --target web --out-dir ../quadratic-client/src/app/quadratic-core --weak-refs'
scripts.build:wasm:javascript: cd quadratic-core && CC=clang AR=llvm-ar wasm-pack build --dev --target web --out-dir ../quadratic-client/src/app/quadratic-core --weak-refs
scripts.watch:wasm:perf:javascript: cd quadratic-core && cargo watch -s 'CC=clang AR=llvm-ar wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../quadratic-client/src/app/quadratic-core --weak-refs'
scripts.build:wasm:perf:javascript: cd quadratic-core && CC=clang AR=llvm-ar wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../quadratic-client/src/app/quadratic-core --weak-refs
scripts.watch:rust-client: cd quadratic-rust-client && cargo watch -s 'CC=clang AR=llvm-ar wasm-pack build --dev --target web --out-dir ../quadratic-client/src/app/quadratic-rust-client --weak-refs'
scripts.build:rust-client: cd quadratic-rust-client && CC=clang AR=llvm-ar wasm-pack build --dev --target web --out-dir ../quadratic-client/src/app/quadratic-rust-client --weak-refs
scripts.build:rust-client:perf: cd quadratic-rust-client && CC=clang AR=llvm-ar wasm-pack build--target web --out-dir ../quadratic-client/src/app/quadratic-rust-client --weak-refs
scripts.coverage:wasm:gen: cd quadratic-core && cd quadratic-core && CARGO_INCREMENTAL=0 RUSTFLAGS='-Cinstrument-coverage' LLVM_PROFILE_FILE='coverage/cargo-test-%p-%m.profraw' cargo test
scripts.coverage:wasm:html: cd quadratic-core && cd quadratic-core && grcov . --binary-path ./target/debug/deps/ -s . -t html --branch --ignore-not-existing --ignore 'src/wasm_bindings/*' --ignore 'src/bin/*' --ignore '../*' --ignore '/*' -o coverage/html
scripts.kill: kill-port 3000 && kill-port 8000 && kill-port 3001 && kill-port 3002 && kill-port 3003 && kill-port 6379 && kill-port 8001 && kill-port 5432 && kill-port 4566 && kill-port 80 && kill-port 443
scripts.docker:base: ECR_OR_BUILD=build CLIENT_DEV=false docker compose --profile base --env-file .env.docker up
scripts.docker:connection: ECR_OR_BUILD=build docker compose --profile base --profile quadratic-connection-db --env-file .env.docker up
scripts.docker:dev: ECR_OR_BUILD=build CLIENT_DEV=true docker compose --profile dev --env-file .env.docker up -d && docker attach quadratic-dev
scripts.docker:build: ECR_OR_BUILD=build CLIENT_DEV=false docker compose --profile all --env-file .env.docker up
scripts.docker:build:dev: ECR_OR_BUILD=build CLIENT_DEV=true docker compose --profile all --env-file .env.docker up
scripts.docker:ecr: ECR_OR_BUILD=ecr CLIENT_DEV=false docker compose --profile all --env-file .env.docker up
scripts.docker:down: ECR_OR_BUILD=build CLIENT_DEV=false docker compose --profile all --env-file .env.docker down
scripts.docker:clean: docker system prune -af && docker builder prune -af && docker volume prune -af
